title: How to Hold Small Screws Steadily on the Tip of a Screwdriver

steps.headline: Place a small ball of your chosen putty adhesive on the tip of the screwdriver.
Insert the screw into the putty adhesive to hold it in place.
Continue with your work.
steps.description: You are now ready to screw it into place without it falling off the screwdriver.
